name: Abraham
review: They are very professional, i have ordered a parts last month & i received original product within estimated delivery time. recommanded.

name: Shafik
review: Quck dellivery, original product . on time shipping. thanks hexashop.

name: Faisal
review: Carparts got back to me very quickly about the issues that I had, so hopefully it will be fully resolved in a couple weeks! Thank you very much.

name: Riyad
review: I had a issue with my parts way back in February. I've put off writing a review. I've gotten a dozen emails from them to review just because I'm constantly buying parts from them. They're super cheap and arrive to my house in perfectly packed boxes.

name: Abedin
review: Got my driveshaft and direct perfect fit, only issue was it didn't ship from their facility till the day AFTER I was supposed to already have it. They did compensate on shipping though so I can deal with that and was a better price than anywhere else.
